title: Gradient Boosting With Categorical Features
description: In this lab, we will be using the Ames Housing dataset to compare different methods of handling categorical features in Gradient Boosting estimators. The dataset contains both numerical and categorical features, and the target is the sales price of the houses. We will compare the performance of four different pipelines:
